definition: جسد II to make corporeal, invest with a body, embody, incarnate (هـ s.th.), give concrete form (هـ to s.th.); to render or represent in corporeal form (هـ s.th.) V to become corporeal, assume concrete form, materialize; to become incarnate (Chr.); to become three-dimensional جسد jasad pl. اجساد ajsād body│ عيد الجسد ‘īd al-j. and خميس الجسد Corpus Christi Day (Chr.)
